targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    *
FROM (
    SELECT 
        'Run {{RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_setup_WNS' THEN value END) AS place_setup_WNS,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_setup_WNS' THEN value END) AS cts_setup_WNS,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_setup_WNS' THEN value END) AS route_setup_WNS
    FROM {{RUN_TABLE}} 
    WHERE metric ILIKE '%WNS'

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        'Run {{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_setup_WNS' THEN value END) AS place_setup_WNS,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_setup_WNS' THEN value END) AS cts_setup_WNS,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_setup_WNS' THEN value END) AS route_setup_WNS
    FROM {{NEXT_RUN_TABLE}} 
    WHERE metric ILIKE '%WNS'
) AS subquery;

        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_setup_TNS' THEN value END) AS route_setup_TNS

SELECT 
    'Run {{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_density(%)' THEN value END) AS floorplan_density,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_density(%)' THEN value END) AS place_density,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_density(%)' THEN value END) AS cts_density,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_density(%)' THEN value END) AS route_density
FROM 
    {{NEXT_RUN_TABLE}};

SELECT 
    'Run {{RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_density(%)' THEN value END) AS floorplan_density,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_density(%)' THEN value END) AS place_density,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_density(%)' THEN value END) AS cts_density,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'route_density(%)' THEN value END) AS route_density
FROM 
    {{RUN_TABLE}};

SELECT 
    'place_Run {{RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_power_Internal' THEN value END) AS power_Internal,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_power_switching' THEN value END) AS power_switching,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_power_leakage' THEN value END) AS power_leakage
FROM {{RUN_POWER_TABLE}}
WHERE metric ILIKE '%power%'

UNION ALL

SELECT 
    'place_Run {{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_power_Internal' THEN value END) AS power_Internal,
    MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_power_switching' THEN value END) AS power_switching,

WHERE metric ILIKE '%power%'

UNION ALL

panels.title: instance count for run{{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}} across stages

targets.rawSql:
SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS run_no, 
    *
FROM (
    SELECT 
        'Run {{RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_Hotspot(max)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS floorplan_hotspot_max,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_Hotspot(max)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS place_hotspot_max,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_Hotspot(max)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS cts_hotspot_max
    FROM 
        {{RUN_TABLE}}

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        'Run {{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_Hotspot(max)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS floorplan_hotspot_max,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_Hotspot(max)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS place_hotspot_max,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_Hotspot(max)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS cts_hotspot_max
    FROM 
        {{NEXT_RUN_TABLE}}
) AS subquery;

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS run_no, 
    *
FROM (
    SELECT 
        'Run {{RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_Hotspot(total)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS floorplan_hotspot_total,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_Hotspot(total)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS place_hotspot_total,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_Hotspot(total)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS cts_hotspot_total
    FROM 
        {{RUN_TABLE}}

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        'Run {{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_Hotspot(total)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS floorplan_hotspot_total,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_Hotspot(total)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS place_hotspot_total,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_Hotspot(total)' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS cts_hotspot_total
    FROM 
        {{NEXT_RUN_TABLE}}
) AS subquery;

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS run_no, 
    *
FROM (
    SELECT 
        'Run {{RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_overflow(H(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS floorplan_overflow_h,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_overflow(H(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS place_overflow_h,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_overflow(H(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS cts_overflow_h
    FROM 
        {{RUN_TABLE}} 

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        'Run {{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_overflow(H(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS floorplan_overflow_h,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_overflow(H(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS place_overflow_h,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_overflow(H(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS cts_overflow_h
    FROM 
        {{NEXT_RUN_TABLE}}
) AS subquery;

SELECT 
    ROW_NUMBER() OVER () AS run_no, 
    *
FROM (
    SELECT 
        'Run {{RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_overflow(V(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS floorplan_overflow_v,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_overflow(V(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS place_overflow_v,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_overflow(V(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS cts_overflow_v
    FROM 
        {{RUN_TABLE}} 

    UNION ALL

    SELECT 
        'Run {{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'floorplan_overflow(V(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS floorplan_overflow_v,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'place_overflow(V(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS place_overflow_v,
        MAX(CASE WHEN metric = 'cts_overflow(V(%))' THEN CAST(value AS FLOAT) END) AS cts_overflow_v
    FROM 
        {{NEXT_RUN_TABLE}}
) AS subquery;

SELECT 
    metric,
    MAX(CASE WHEN run = 'Run {{RUN_NUMBER}}' THEN value END) AS run{{RUN_NUMBER}}_value,
    MAX(CASE WHEN run = 'Run {{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}' THEN value END) AS run{{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}_value
FROM (
    SELECT 
        metric,
        value,
        'Run {{RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run
    FROM 
        {{RUN_COMPARE_TABLE}} 

    UNION ALL
    
    SELECT 
        metric,
        value,
        'Run {{NEXT_RUN_NUMBER}}' AS run
    FROM 
        {{NEXT_RUN_COMPARE_TABLE}} 
) AS combined_data
GROUP BY 
    metric
ORDER BY 
    metric;
